idea-plugin.name: Base16 Solarized Dark
idea-plugin.vendor: Ethan Schoonover (modified by aramisgithub), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Solarized Dark for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Ethan Schoonover (modified by aramisgithub). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
